Info.Title: Heatstroke
Info.Writer: Anne Brooksbank, Hannah Nyala (novel), Evelyn Purcell

Info.Plot: On a family trip in the African desert, a research scientist unintentionally travels off course and is brutally murdered by an arms dealer. His girlfriend is put to the ultimate survival ...
